ygData.subject: RE: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: I know you said Karana but meant Commonlands, sorry to correct you. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
I know you said Karana but meant Commonlands, sorry to correct you.

Shada

> West Karana - go for the y-kodis and full kodis - need a
> helper or 2 and
> you'll do good. Also if the Dervs are spawning nicely - you and some
> friends can keep them at bay.
>
> East Karana - there is a terrible snake problem near the N Ro
> tunnel. It's
> your duty to do something about it! Wear some stuff that is
> anti-poison!
> Keep Purifying Rythmns playing. Asp's are nasty beasties! By 14, you
> should be able to solo them - having a friend with cure
> poison really helps.
> Also you can hope for the occasional air-elemental and wisp to go by.
>
